meanings.definition: The quality of being expensive or costly.
meanings.sent1: The dearness of the designer handbag made it unaffordable for many people.
meanings.sent2: The dearness of living in the city often requires careful budgeting.
meanings.sent3: The dearness of the concert tickets left me with an empty wallet but a full heart.
meanings.sent4: The dearness of time spent with loved ones is truly priceless.
meanings.sent5: The dearness of the rare gemstone made it a coveted treasure.

meanings.definition: The state of being cherished or beloved.
meanings.sent1: The dearness of her childhood teddy bear brought back fond memories.
meanings.sent2: The dearness of family traditions creates a strong bond between generations.
meanings.sent3: The dearness of his favorite toy made it the envy of all his friends.
meanings.sent4: The dearness of a loyal pet can bring comfort during difficult times.
meanings.sent5: The dearness of handwritten letters in today's digital age is heartwarming.
